getChatBotProjectList.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT * ,
CONCAT(SUBSTRING( PMStartDateTime , 1, 4),'년',SUBSTRING( PMStartDateTime , 5, 2),'월',SUBSTRING( PMStartDateTime , 7, 2),'일') as StartDate ,
CONCAT(SUBSTRING( PMEndDateTime , 1, 4),'년',SUBSTRING( PMEndDateTime , 5, 2),'월',SUBSTRING( PMEndDateTime , 7, 2),'일') as EndDate ,
(Select MethodologyName from Methodology Where MethodologyCode = A.MethodologyCode) as MethodologyName,
(Select ProjectName From Project Where ProjectCode = A.ProjectCode) as ProjectName,
(Select TeamName From Team Where TeamCode = A.TeamCode) as ProjectTeamName
FROM ProjectManagement A
Order By PMStartDateTime DESC
